comments.description: Retrieves the addon details from the AMO API endpoint, used to create abuse reports on non-installed addon-ons. For the addon details that may be translated (e.g. addon name, description etc.) the function will try to retrieve the string localized in the same locale used by Gecko (and fallback to "en-US" if that locale is unavailable). The addon creator properties are set to the first author available.

tags.name: addonId
tags.description: The id of the addon to retrieve the details available on AMO.

source.source: *        The id of the addon to retrieve the details available on AMO.

tokens.description: The id of the addon to retrieve the details available on AMO.

tokens.description: The entry point for the report flow (to be included in the telemetry
recorded in case of failures).

comments.description: Helper function that retrieves from an addon object all the data to send as part of the submission request, besides the `reason`, `message` which are going to be received from the submit method of the report object returned by `createAbuseReport`. (See https://addons-server.readthedocs.io/en/latest/topics/api/abuse.html)
